modName: Dark Lilith Sexy Armor for CBBE
summary: Add the Hentai Dark Lilith armor from oblivion. perfect for a Succubus or demoness charcater.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img838/3428/uin4.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/2282/descriptionw.png[/IMG]
This mod is a convertion of Hentai Dark Lilith armor by Zotmann12. I add to it my push up body to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. The effect is more noticeable if you have a character with a big chest. 

[IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/9611/iux5.jpg[/IMG]

You can have all the bonus of light armor. The defense is like the glass armor.
The armor is located in a chest in Solitude next to the clothes shop :

[IMG]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/4977/ipla.png[/IMG]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img851/2514/aword.png[/IMG]

The Pushup body is a modified body from Caliente made by me. It \"equip\" the most of my clothing mods to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. [color=red]That why all my mods are uncompatible with other type of body [/color]. This body works perfectly with all the CBBE original bodies. See my others mods to see more examples. It doesn\'t replace anything.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img197/5359/du4f.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8249/udpate.png[/IMG]

2.0.1

 - Fix the invisible pieces of armor in inventory.

2.0 

 - Add to Push up body 4.0.
 - The armor can be crafted at forge.
 - The texture path has been changed.
 - The appearance of the items in inventory has been modified (no carton box).

1.0

Next version
 - Possibility to upgrade.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img259/6420/dlinstallation.png[/IMG]

- Make sure tu use the lastest update or the desired version.
- Make sure you have the lighe \'\'bEnableFileSelection=1\'\' in SkyrimPrefs.ini under [Launcher].
- Make sure \"SDarLilithArmor.esp\" is checked in Data Files in the Skyrim launcher or in Nexus mod Manager.
- If you update, copy files into data directory and click Ok to overwrite files.

If it you first mod you have to add that line in SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My document/MyGames/Skyrim or something. Add the line in bold in [Launcher] section like this :
 
[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1

To uninstall:
1. Start Skyrim launcher, click Data Files, .esp.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img407/1424/recomm.png[/IMG]

[color=orange]Calientes Female Body â€“CBBE by Caliente [/color]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Link[/URL]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img13/6623/creditseq.png[/IMG]

Caliente for her beautiful CBBE
Zotman12 for his original work on Oblivion

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/545/58619h01.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/3681/58619h01.png[/IMG][/URL]
